mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (cart_num, item_num, count) VALUES( #{cartNum}, #{itemNum}, #{count} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart c JOIN cart_item ci ON c.cart_num = ci.cart_num WHERE ci.cart_item_num = #{cartItemNum}

SELECT cart_item_num, ci.cart_num, item_name, item_price, ci.count, item_image FROM cart_item ci JOIN item i ON ci.item_num = i.item_num JOIN cart c ON ci.cart_num = c.cart_num WHERE c.cart_num = #{cartNum}

SELECT cart_item_num, ci.cart_num, item_name, item_price, ci.count, item_image, ci.item_num, cu.cust_name FROM cart_item ci JOIN item i ON ci.item_num = i.item_num JOIN cart c ON ci.cart_num = c.cart_num JOIN customer cu ON cu.cust_num = c.cust_num WHERE ci.cart_item_num = #{cartItemNum}
